title: 112 How to Cultivate Creativity, Cash In On Crowdfunding, and Turn Great Ideas Into Millions with Chris Hawker
description:
"The leader's job isn't to have all the ideas. It's to make sure all the ideas are heard and that the best one wins." - Chris Hawker
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, links, and more at www.lewishowes.com/112.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
